identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a travel platform that feels like a high-end magazine, not a spreadsheet.

core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 'National Geographic' aesthetics with 'Fintech' precision.
Emotion First: Every pixel must promise adventure or safety.
Content is King: Images are the heroes; UI is the frame.
Zoom In: Use macro details for textures (sand, snow, skin).
Negative Space: Luxury = Space. Don't crowd the dream.
anti_patterns: No 'Teal' for CTAs (Use Sunset Orange or Deep Ocean).

usage.h1: text-5xl md:text-7xl font-bold tracking-tight leading-none font-serif
usage.caption: text-xs uppercase tracking-widest font-medium text-muted-foreground/80

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=DM+Sans:opsz,wght@9..40,400;500;700&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&family=Playfair+Display:ital,wght@0,400;0,600;0,700;1,400&display=swap');

primary.name: Deep Ocean
primary.usage: Brand identity, active states, primary icons

theme_strategy.public_pages: Light Mode (Nature-inspired). Backgrounds: Stone-50/White. Text: Stone-900.
theme_strategy.admin_dashboard: Dense Light Mode or Dark Mode. High contrast. Backgrounds: White (clean) or Slate-950 (focus).

textures.grain: Use a subtle SVG noise overlay on hero sections to kill digital flatness.

public_marketing.grid: Mode A: The Tetris Grid. Asymmetric bento layouts for trip lists.
public_marketing.spacing: Generous. py-24 or py-32 for sections.

admin_dashboard.grid: Mode B: The Control Room. Dense, data-heavy, 4-column grid.
admin_dashboard.sidebar: Fixed left sidebar (w-64), scrollable main content.

buttons.primary: bg-orange-500 hover:bg-orange-600 text-white rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-medium transition-transform hover:scale-105 active:scale-95 shadow-lg shadow-orange-500/20
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-stone-900 border border-stone-200 hover:bg-stone-50 rounded-full px-6 py-6 font-medium
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-stone-100 text-stone-600 hover:text-stone-900 rounded-lg px-4 py-2

cards.trip_card: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl border-0 shadow-none hover:shadow-2xl transition-all duration-500
cards.dashboard_stat: p-6 rounded-xl border border-stone-200 bg-white flex flex-col gap-2

inputs.style: h-12 rounded-lg border-stone-200 focus:border-teal-600 focus:ring-teal-600/20 bg-stone-50/50

hero.alt: Dramatic pink clouds over snow-capped mountains

community.alt: Diverse group of friends in forest

rules: All images must have alt text.
Interactive elements must have aria-labels if no text is present.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a high-end travel platform. Do not make it look like a generic admin template. Use the 'Playfair Display' font for all headings to give it a premium feel.
instructions_to_main_agent.file_structure: Use .js and .jsx extensions. The project is in /app/frontend.
instructions_to_main_agent.styling: Use Tailwind CSS for everything. Avoid custom CSS files unless for animations.
instructions_to_main_agent.components: Use the existing Shadcn components in /src/components/ui but override their default styles to match the 'Nature/Luxury' theme (more rounded, softer borders).
instructions_to_main_agent.admin_dashboard: For the admin dashboard, switch to a 'Control Room' aesthetic: denser grids, smaller text, high data density, but keep the font family consistent.

do_not: Do not use generic blue (#3B82F6) for primary actions.
Do not center text by default.
Do not use 'Lorem Ipsum' - use real travel-related copy.
must_do: Ensure mobile responsiveness for all pages.
